categories: Category:The New Jedi Order Sourcebook web articles

nodes.text: Staring at the Stars is a role-playing supplement that was written by J.D. Wiker and Steve Miller. The supplement was published online by Wizards of the Coast in 2002 as additional information that was not contained in The New Jedi Order Sourcebook. The article is divided into three parts and includes role-playing information regarding ExGal personnel, followed by information about the station ExGal-4 and lastly information regarding Danni Quee.
